title: Surrealism and Its Affinities Vintage Poster
description:
Poster developed from the Surrealism and Its Affinities: the Mary Reynolds Collection poster, from 1973, an exhibit a the Art Institute of Chicago.

Add a piece of Art Institute of Chicago history to your home with this reinterpretation of the 1973 Surrealism and Its Affinities poster.  The exhibit featured Surrealist, Dada and Futurist art books, albums, magazines, catalogues and pamphlets by Apollinaire, Breton, Calder, Dali, Duchamp, Eluard, Ernst, Marinetti, Man Ray, Schwitters, and many more.

  • Dimensions: 24 x 36 in.
  • Premium Cardstock.
  • Matte Finish.

Additional Shipping $15 per Order.

This item cannot be shipped to a destination outside the United States.
